Description:
The Field Sales Manager for Key Accounts is responsible for leading the Key Account sales team and manage day to day operations within budgeted guidelines and to the highest standards.He/she will manage the team of direct reports and will be responsible for coaching and developing the team accordingly.The FSM will establish a clear understanding of the company’s strategy and implement this throughout the field sales team, as well as monitor the efforts of sales representatives to ensure that targets are closed.Daily tasks of the role include:Outlining and communicating sales targets
Set monthly sales targets/objectives and KPIs for the Key Account team
And/or follow up daily customer’s LPO’s, deliveries and returns.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree is Sales/Marketing or relevant Business-related fields.
4 years of proven experience in FSM, or similar roles
Valid Kuwait driving license
Excellent knowledge of the latest trends in terms of customer demands.
Bilingual (English and Arabic)
Ability to conduct sales presentation.
